title: African Americans in the Union Army

content.question: The phrase in the excerpt “Some of them seem willing to fight for you” could most likely be interpreted as having which of the following purposes?

choices.label: Authorizing the policy of total war by Union generals in fighting in the South
Addressing the difficulties of feeding runaway enslaved people at military encampments
Acknowledging the shuffling of commanding officers in the Union army
Highlighting the enlistment of formerly enslaved people into the Union army

content.answer: Highlighting the enlistment of formerly enslaved people into the Union army
